tool_description: Zip code data for north america.
name: Be Zips
title: Be Zips

api_list.name: Search zip codes in mexico
api_list.description: Perform a text search in zip codes in Mexico

api_list.name: Get zip code in Mexico
api_list.description: Get zip code data given a specific zip code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://be-zips.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/mx/zipcodes/32390"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "be-zips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://be-zips.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/mx/zipcodes/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "be-zips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
